channel.title: Error making a webclient
channel.description:
I jar'ed the files and everything and when I go to run the .jar file it shows the loading bar then quickly switches to a black screen with yellow text reading this:
Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading TeleScape To fix this try the following (in order): 1. Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading 2. Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options 3. Try using a different game-world 4. Try rebooting your computer 5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu
also I get this message in my batch dos screen.
THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY DOUBLE-CLICK THE "ownage4life.jar" TO RUN IT - Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/) C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Desktop\RichScape Client v4>java -jar ownage4life.jar Error: loaderror Starting up 20 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4489) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140) at client.run(client.java:4269) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Error making a webclient
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

I have read it, and it works I uploaded it all. It loads the client but now I get this error:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: nullmain_file_cache.dat (Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:55) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4489) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic

item.title: Error making a webclient
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

I jar’ed the files and everything and when I go to run the .jar file it shows the loading bar then quickly switches to a black screen with yellow text reading this:

Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading TeleScape

To fix this try the following (in order):

  1. Try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading
  2. Try clearing your web-browsers cache from tools->internet options
  3. Try using a different game-world
  4. Try rebooting your computer
  5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu

also I get this message in my batch dos screen.

THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY
DOUBLE-CLICK THE “ownage4life.jar” TO RUN IT

Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/)

C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Desktop\RichScape Client v4>java -jar
ownage4life.jar
Error: loaderror Starting up 20
Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.method8(client.java:4489)
at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140)
at client.run(client.java:4269)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

What am I doing wrong?

Read full topic
